text: Two Mules for Sister Sara is a 1970 American Mexican action Western movie directed by Don Siegel and starring Clint Eastwood, Shirley MacLaine, Manolo FÃ¡bregas, Alberto Morin, Armando Silvestre, Enrique Lucero, Xavier Marc and David Estuardo.
